Cc: 
Christian Everdell 
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] URGENT: Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 
I am following up with the appropriate department. 
>>> BOBBI C STERNHEIM 10/29/2021 11:50 AM >Â» 
Further my earlier email today, as of 10:30 a.m., USPO tracking lists the following 4 items of legal mail 
"Available for Pickup" and does not indicate that MDC has retrieved or received them. 
Ms. Maxwell has not received legal mail in more than a week. 
Please confirm IMMEDIATELY the status of these items on your end. 
Failure to response today will result in the filing of an order to show cause requiring your presence in Court. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of 
Bobbi C. Stemheim 
225 Broadway, Suite 715 
New York, NY 10007 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim that 
may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then 
delete this message. Thank you. 
> --
> Isabel Maxwell, Paralegal, Leah Saffian, Inc. 
> LAW OFFICES OF LEAH SAFFIAN; LEAH SAFFIAN BA JD LLM 
> 11420 SANTA MONICA BLVD #25424 LOS 
ANGELES. 
CA 90025 USA 
EFTA00028100

> NOTICE: The information transmitted by this email is intended only 
for the person or entity to which it is addressed. This email may contain proprietary, business-confidential and/or 
legally privileged material. If you are not the intended recipient of this message, be aware that any use, review, 
retransmission, distribution, reproduction or any action taken in reliance upon this messa e is strictly prohibited. 
If you received this in error, please contact the sender Isabel Maxwell at Te nd delete the 
material from all computers. 
EFTA00028101
